M13/1/AXPUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX




     22130627

PUNJABI A: LITERATURE – STANDARD LEVEL – PAPER 1
PANJABI A : Littérature – NIVEAU MOYEN – ÉPREUVE 1
PUNJABI A: LITERATURA – NIVEL MEDIO – PRUEBA 1

Wednesday 8 May 2013 (morning)
Mercredi 8 mai 2013 (matin)
Miércoles 8 de mayo de 2013 (mañana)

1 hour 30 minutes / 1 heure 30 minutes / 1 hora 30 minutos


INSTRUCTIONS TO CANDIDATES
 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Write a guided literary analysis on one passage only. In your answer you must address both
  of the guiding questions provided.
 The maximum mark for this examination paper is [20 marks].

INSTRUCTIONS DESTINÉES AUX CANDIDATS
 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Rédigez une analyse littéraire dirigée d’un seul des passages. Les deux questions d’orientation
  fournies doivent être traitées dans votre réponse.
 Le nombre maximum de points pour cette épreuve d’examen est [20 points].

INSTRUCCIONES PARA LOS ALUMNOS
 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Escriba un análisis literario guiado sobre un solo pasaje. Debe abordar las dos preguntas de
  orientación en su respuesta.
 La puntuación máxima para esta prueba de examen es [20 puntos].




2213-0627                                                                                   4 pages/páginas

isrP iz<k bNw wa inrweiSq saihqk ivSleSx ilKo . ]apxe [u>qr iv<c quha¥ inrweSn krwe iw<qe hoze wohA
svalA bare ZrUr ilKxa cahIwa hE .

1.

                  izkrar ]nusar jsbIr [uh¥ lEx ig]a qA crnjIq ne saP kih iw<qa ik jw q<k [uh mA
            naloM juwa nhIM huNwa, mEM nhIM jaxa . jsbIr ne [uh¥ ]apxI mA wI ]vsQa w<s ke bQera mna[ux wI
            koiSS kIqI . rqn wI siQqI wa ]asra vI il]a . izh vI ikha ik wo-chuN salA ¥ v<K ho javAge .
            jw q<k r<qI ikse bNne kNDe l<g javega pr crnjIq ts qoM ms na hozI . ]Nq jsbIr muf ]aiz]a .
      5     crnjIq ¥ nal na weK ke mA ne dad marI, “ve crnjIq …?” “[uh ]azI nhIM mNmI jI .”
                  “]azI ik[uM nzHIM ?”
                  “]EmIM .” ]aK ke jsbIr cu<p kr ig]a .
                  “ve w<swa kahqoM nzHIM ? kI g<l hozI ?”
                  “]aKwI ]a ik [uh sAJe Gr ‘c nzHIM ]a skwI . juwa hox ‘qe ]avegI .”
     10           pl wI pl qA mnjIq ¥ izNj l<ga ijveM heTlI [uqe ]a gzI hove . [uhwa sara supn-mh<l Kaf
            Kaf krke id<g ip]a hove . [uhwI]A b<s WUfA hI [udwI]A iws rhI]A hox . wo iqNn varI g<l krn
            wa yqn vI kIqa pr mUNhoM Sbw bahr ]a hI nhIM rhe sn . ikNnI wer mgroM [uh rqa sNBlI . [uh QofHa
            bhuq ]ape ‘c prqI qA iwl ¥ gND we ke kihx l<gI, “c<l p<uq [uhwa kihxa zI mNn lE !”
                  “mEM quha¥ qe r<qI ¥ C<d ke ik<wA juwa ho skwA ?”
     15           “hEga qA bhuq ]OKa pr je [uh biZw ]a qA hor kozI rah vI nzHIM !”
                  “bETI rhe [u>Qe .”
                  “izh qA kozI h<l nzHIM kaka .”
                  “qA mEM quha¥ qe r<qI ¥ C<d ke juwa ho javA ?”
                  “hA, hux izhI rah TIk hE kaka !” mA ne iwl qe p<Qr r<K ke kih iw<qa .
     20           “mEM [uhwI hr g<l mNnx lzI iq]ar hA pr izh nzHIM mNn skwa .”
                  “hr g<l iv<c izh g<l vI ]OMwI ]a pu<q !”
                  “qusIM vI izhI cahuNwe ho ?”
                  “hA kaka !” mA ne Zihr wI golI ingl ke ikha, “zewA [uhwI qe qerI iZNwgI rulxoM bc javegI .”
                  “quhadI beSk rulwI rhe ?”
     25           mnjIq ne pihlA qA kihxa caih]a ik [uhwI qA cOwA sal pihlA hI rul gzI sI . rulI wa
            hor kI rul javega pr wUje pl hI [uh ]ape ‘qe kabU pa[uMwI hozI kihx l<gI, “nzHIM , merI vI rulwI .
            quhadI KuSI merI KuSI ze ! nale mere kol r<qI ju ze . qusIM vI kwI kwI ]a ke mE¥ weK jaiz]a kir{ .”
                  “r<qI wa iv]ah vI qA hoxE mNmI ? [uhwI vazIP na [uh¥ juwa hox lzI ]aKU ?”
                  “ho skwE [uh na ]aKe . sarI wunI]A iz<ko ijhI QofHI huNwI ze ?”
     30           kaPI icr wlIlbaZI huNwI rhI . ]Nq mnjIq ne ]apxI wlIl nal jsbIr ¥ mna il]a .
            [uh¥ shuir]A ¥ qor ke mnjIq v<De ru<K vAg GuNmetxI Ka ke bEdsEtI ‘qe mUNh Bar Dih pzI .
            iPr [uhwI CaqI wa [uBar Zor Zor wI [uBrn l<g ip]a . veKiw]A veKiw]A [uhwI]A ]<KA ‘coM prl
            prl hNJU vgx l<g pze . iwl wa gubar vih hit]a qA [uh mIl mIl Br lNme h[uke lE ke bET gzI .
            bETI bETI ¥ japx l<ga ijveM bfe Zor wI J<Kf Ju<l irha hove ijhfa hr SE] [ultazI pltazI ja
     35     irha sI . mZbUq qoM mZbUq ru<K vI pu<tI ja irha sI, [uKafI ja irha sI . iPr [uh ru<K ikNj shI slamq
            rih skwa sI ijs heT [uh ]alHxa bxazI bETI sI ? [us vI qA [uKfna hI sI . [uhwe nal vI izh Baxa
            bIqxa hI sI .

                                                              wrSn isNG WIr, J<Kf qe ru<K, dir]a mnu<K (1994)

      (a)   varqa iv<cle paqrA ]qe halaqA bare qusIM kI smJwe ho ?

      (b)   leKk vloM vrqI gzI bolI ]qe varqalap varqa iv<c peS kIqe gze mnoBavA ¥ vasqivk bna[ux
            iv<c ikveM mww krwe hn ?  




2213-0627                                                  Turn over / Tournez la page / Véase al dorso
                                                   –4–                 M13/1/AXPUN/SP1/PAN/TZ0/XX

2.

                                              Pera qA kwe pa ve

                          iv<c prwes we bih ig]a ja ke, Pera qA kwe pa ve,
                          merI mihNwI wa rNg [uwas ho ig]a, muf vqnA v<l ]a ve .

                          na bewrwa qE¥ wrw hoiz]a, na berihmA qUN rihm kIqa,
                          na nIMw raqA ¥ ]a[uMwI ve, na wo GfI]A iwne cEn kIqa,
                      5   mE¥ wunI]A [ujfI japwI hE, qUN hor na ijNw qfPa ve,
                          merI mihNwI wa rNg [uwas ho ig]a, muf vqnA v<l ]a ve .

                          iwl we iv<c lko ke r<KI, mEM s<jxa qsvIr qerI,
                          prwesI nal iv]ah r<ba, ikho ijhI qkwIr merI,
                          cifH]a cNn qUN mera s<jxa, na b<wlA heT Cupa ve,
                     10   merI mihNwI wa rNg [uwas ho ig]a, muf vqnA v<l ]a ve .

                          yarA nal bharA huNwI]A, s<c is]axe kihNwe,
                          nar in]axI we Gr s<jxa, [ulJe qaxe rihNwe,
                          hux na s<jxa iv<c ic<TI we, JUTa lara la ve,
                          merI mihNwI wa rNg [uwas ho ig]a, muf vqnA v<l ]a ve .

                     15   kotlI vale mucre vagUN, vswEM qUN qA wUr cNna,
                          kag bnere [u>qoM [uda[uMwI, rihNwI qerI hUr cNna,
                          ]rZ krA mEM sNWU]a qE¥, ]a ke mu<K iwKa ve,
                          merI mihNwI wa rNg [uwas ho ig]a, muf vqnA v<l ]a ve .

                                                    jsvIr sNWU qe kaka mucra, sada icfI]A wa cNba ve (2007)


      (a)   izs kivqa iv<c peS kIqe mnoBavA qe it<pxI kro .

      (b)   kivqa iv<c vrqI gzI bolI, SbwavlI ]qe kvI we ilKx we DNg bare it<pxI kro .
